node.doctext:
How do I link to modules on CPAN?

If you want to link to a module on CPAN, you can make a link that looks like [cpan://Net::Syslog].
This will result in a link like this: [cpan://Net::Syslog].

More Interesting and Useful Information

... is available in "[id://43037]"

Back to the [PerlMonks FAQ]
